attributes.action: scrap the new london olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the new logo should be scrapped
it cost £400,000 to make somthing a 5 year old could have made in paint. the advert for it can trigger epileptic fits to some people and it looks like the nazi ss symbol!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
